com.tapad.tapestry

Class TapestryUICallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tapad.tapestry.TapestryUICallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TapestryCallback

    public abstract class TapestryUICallback
extends java.lang.Object
implements TapestryCallback
    A convenience class for running callbacks in the Android UI thread.

    In situations where the UI will be updated based on the TapestryResponse, the callback will need to execute it's view-updating methods on the UI thread. This class provides an convenient way to do so.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        public void receive(TapestryResponse response,
           java.lang.Exception exception,
           long millisSinceInvocation)
        Description copied from interface: TapestryCallback
        Receives the Tapestry response.
        Specified by:
        receive in interface TapestryCallback
        Parameters:
        response - The response from Tapestry
        exception - Any exception thrown if the request fails, otherwise null
        millisSinceInvocation - Time since the request was sent. If a request is sent and the user has no network connection, this time will be as long as it takes for a network connection to be found.
